channel.title: Mini Mass Ban
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/newsitem.ws?id=2730
So ye, so far Cowie got an account banned, I'm hoping mine wont be banned!

item.title: Mini Mass Ban
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:8, topic:331468”][quote author=Adam link=topic=427847.msg3141816#msg3141816 date=1267639458]

[quote]2,376 total level (520 days of in-game time)
2,308 total level (477 days of in-game time)
2,210 total level (365 days of in-game time)
2,179 total level (1,004 days of in-game time)
2,131 total level (394 days of in-game time)
2,105 total level (202 days of in-game time)
2,102 total level (274 days of in-game time)
2,096 total level (448 days of in-game time)
2,022 total level (337 days of in-game time)
2,021 total level (275 days of in-game time)[/quote]
That’s just ridiculous…

[/quote]Yeah like wtf man. RSC was first made public in 2001 meaning in total rs has been around for 9 years which totals up to 3285 days. If he has actually been online for that long he has spent 3 years of his life on the computer. Hahhahahaha[/quote]

And now he has nothing to show for it. 1000 days for nothing.

fuckin lol

Read full topic

item.title: Mini Mass Ban

item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

I just looked at a video but I don’t understand how it could’ve been discovered so late. I mean, it’s not like people don’t make enchanted dragon bolts so what the hell?

item.title: Mini Mass Ban
item.dc:creator: @g-stringer g-stringer
item.description:
@g-stringer wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:4, topic:331468”][quote author=Cowie` link=topic=427847.msg3141700#msg3141700 date=1267621373]
I didn’t get an account banned…

I got three 120+ banned.
[/quote]
I’m curious as to what the exploit was. I don’t like the double standard set my Jagex either (previously, people weren’t punished for abusing the bug that allowed them to store items in a familiar and not lose them while in PvP worlds, thus letting them accrue large amounts of earning potential for future drops).[/quote]

You can youtube the dragon bolt glitch, basically you created 15 (e) dragon bolts ( others were made to ) out of 1 non enchanted bolt hence the extreme profit.

Read full topic

item.title: Mini Mass Ban
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Cowie`, post:3, topic:331468”]I didn’t get an account banned…

I got three 120+ banned.[/quote]
I’m curious as to what the exploit was. I don’t like the double standard set my Jagex either (previously, people weren’t punished for abusing the bug that allowed them to store items in a familiar and not lose them while in PvP worlds, thus letting them accrue large amounts of earning potential for future drops).

item.title: Mini Mass Ban
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

RuneScape

Cheating and Exploits

The recent cheating that occurred and the abuse of an exploit has been dealt with very seriously. We have excellent systems in place to catch and detect players who abuse bugs and have taken appropriate measures.

So ye, so far Cowie got an account banned, I’m hoping mine wont be banned!

Read full topic
